- [93mStructural[0m and [93mFunctional[0m [93mCharacterization[0m of [93mLIMCH1[0m and Its [93mAgmatinase[0m-[93mlike[0m [93mRegion[0m: A [93mCase[0m of [93mCatalysis[0m in a [93mHighly[0m [93mDisordered[0m [93mProtein[0m.: [93mAgmatine[0m is a [93mbiogenic[0m [93mamine[0m that [93mfunctions[0m as a [93mneurotransmitter[0m and [93mexhibits[0m [93manticonvulsant[0m, [93mantineurotoxic[0m, and [93mantidepressant[0m [93mproperties[0m.
